Question: Skai CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Skai

Product: Retail Media Power Plays for 2024 at CES

- Skai to present insights from its annual “State of Retail Media” study at CES 2024
- Partnership with the Path to Purchase Institute
- Exclusive unveiling of study results and expert insights
- Panel discussion with industry experts from Spark Foundry and Criteo
- Strategic discussion areas include market segment and business topics
- Leadership team attending CES from January 9 – 12, 2024
